value.Name: Mountain-400 Silver
value.Description: This bike delivers a high-level of performance on a budget. It is responsive and maneuverable, and offers peace-of-mind when you decide to go off-road.

value.Name: Mountain-500 Black, 42se
value.Description: Suitable for any type of riding, on or off-road. Fits any budget. Smooth-shifting with a comfortable ride.
